body.p: The final thing that I think can contribute to making the life of DITA newbie easier is a custom editor layout that only shows the Oxygen windows that a new user is most likely to use. In my experience, in addition to the main editor pane of course, these are:

You may have your own preferences, but sharing your favorite editor layout could not be easier. Click Window>Export Layout, give the layout a name and save it to a location such as GitHub repository from where it can be shared as a .layout file.
